short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension gives you the ability to remove the clutter from Amazon

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to remove the extra stuff from the Amazon dashboard and listing pages. The extension has an options page so you can customize Amazon the way you would like.
